Name: fdwhandler
Description: references a handler function that is responsible for supplying execution routines for the foreign-data wrapper. zero if no handler is provided

Name: fdwvalidator
Description: references a validator function that is responsible for checking the validity of the options given to the foreign-data wrapper, as well as options for foreign servers and user mappings using the foreign-data wrapper. zero if no validator is provided

Name: fdwacl
Description: access privileges; see grant and revoke for details

Name: fdwoptions
Description: foreign-data wrapper specific options, as "keyword=value" strings
